does the console need to be hacked or can I just dl and rip to dvd and then play?  way back I hacked my playstation with a mod chip and used bootlegs that way. stopped gaming for awhile but now have kids and wii.  So any help in this area would be appreciated.

club1820: Your Wii has to be modded.  Software modding and hardware modding generally work equally well, but software modding is cheaper and not terribly difficult if you're able to follow directions.  It's also reversible if you do it correctly, and the risk of bricking your machine (if you follow the directions correctly) is fairly small
club1820: I recommend the Barnitos Softmod pack from HackMyWii.net
